ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Bard BOTB
ygData.msgSnippet: Of course, it s possible that he himself won t join, knowing that the contest is a waste of his own time.  Who knows? :) ... From: RKR To:
ygData.messageBody:
Of course, it's possible that he himself won't join, knowing that the contest is a waste of his own time. Who knows? :)
----- Original Message -----
From: RKR
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 06, 2001 10:38 AM
Subject: [eqbards] RE: Bard BOTB


So, what Shada (retired) doesn't say outright is that there is no point for
anyone to enter the "BoB" besides Aftathott. To completely refrain from
entering would be the best comment on these equipment contests.

He who has the most time to play with the guild of most dedicated players,
wins. Simple.

Maravana Vireo
Mithaniel Marr
